title: Word of Advice from your jungler.
body:
Its not ur junglers fault that all 3 lanes fed horribly.
-Ur local Jungle main.

replies.body:
*ping ping ping ping ping*  O hey!  It looks like every lane wants me to gank!  I'll pull a fancy Twisted-Rek-Noc-Ulti-Triple-Dash-Thingy and be back to farming in time for blue to respawn!  Oh wait... I can't :/

Thats how I feel when I jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=Terff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jQpiZYEm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-24T02:48:21.698+0000)
>
> *ping ping ping ping ping*  O hey!  It looks like every lane wants me to gank!  I'll pull a fancy Twisted-Rek-Noc-Ulti-Triple-Dash-Thingy and be back to farming in time for blue to respawn!  Oh wait... I can't :/
> 
> Thats how I feel when I jungle.

People are like. WHY DIDNT U GANK RIVEN? SHE WAS AT HALF HP!

...she was also under tower, and still has ult.
xD  Or when they ask you to gank a heimer with all his turrets up

You also have to countergank as if you had Shen ult and Lee Sin Safeguard.

At the same time.

> [{quoted}](name=Terff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jQpiZYEm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-24T02:48:21.698+0000)
>
> *ping ping ping ping ping*  O hey!  It looks like every lane wants me to gank!  I'll pull a fancy Twisted-Rek-Noc-Ulti-Triple-Dash-Thingy and be back to farming in time for blue to respawn!  Oh wait... I can't :/
> 
> Thats how I feel when I jungle.

Lol this made me chuckle, I can emphasize completely with this.
Or when they ask why you're using {{champion:17}}  to jungle. Amirite?
